author: Nick Daino
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
description: Fetches weather forecasts from wttr.in and displays them in Discord. Supports city names, zip codes, and defaults to NY if a location isn't found.
install_msg: Thanks for installing Weather! Use `[p]weather <location>` to get a weather forecast. Examples: `[p]weather Rochester` or `[p]weather 14618`
